About Me

I'm a Full-Stack Web Developer with a passion for creative design and problem solving. I have 3+ years of professional experience in all phases of the development process. I believe coding is an artform and I work hard everyday at mastering my craft.
Strategy
I collaborate with clients to transform raw ideas into well thought out designs.
UX/UI
I create websites with intuitive UI patterns and simple interactions.
Responsive
Experienced in creating responsive layouts that look great on all devices.
Code
I focus on writing SOLID code that is efficient, modular and easy to read.

My Projects

Here is a collection of some of my past projects. You can head over to my GitHub if you'd like to see more.
Website
Github

About this project

Gmaps.js is a JavaScript library that simplifies the development of Google Maps web applications.

The main goal of this project was to provide an integrated id system that would allow the developer to easily manipulate several map objects at once. Check out the website to learn about more of its features!

Skills & Technologies

Google Maps API Design JavaScript Babel.js Grunt ESLint HTML5 Semantic-UI Algolia DocSearch Middleman CSS3 Sass
Website
Github

About this project

A jQuery plugin for the Google Maps Autocomplete class. This plugin allows you to easily autofill address forms or center a map based on the selected location.

I created this plugin after I found a scrolling issue on one of my projects. Besides this layout fix, I also added several useful methods, callbacks and settings.

Skills & Technologies

Google Maps API Design JavaScript jQuery plugin Babel.js ESLint Grunt
Website
Github

About this project

Poly-Split is a Google Maps plugin that extends the Polygon class with a method for splitting out the difference between two intersecting polygons.

This was one of my very first JavaScript projects and really expanded my knowledge on working with Objects and prototypes.

Skills & Technologies

Google Maps JavaScript
Play Game
Github

About this project

An HTML5 game that randomly shuffles images into a 3x3 sliding puzzle. If you get stuck, you can click solve and watch the AI find the shortest possible solution.

All images were created by Kelly N. Hagan. You should check out some of her amazing work!

Skills & Technologies

HTML5 JavaScript Velocity.js Grunt CSS3 Sass Game Design Heuristic Search Artificial Intellignce
Website
Github

About this project

The Frameshop is a family owned business specializing in custom framing. I worked closely with the owners to design and develop a brand new mobile-friendly website.

This was my first freelancing project and one of the first websites that I had ever built from scratch.

Skills & Technologies

HTML5 Responsive Design JavaScript Velocity.js Grunt CSS3 Sass
Play Game
Github

About this project

Simon says is an HTML5 game that tasks the player with remembering a random sequence of numbers. After I found this great ambient loop created by Essa I decided to give the game a sci-fi theme.

See if you can beat my high score of 84! Don't ask me how long it took me to get that...

Skills & Technologies

HTML5 Audio JavaScript Velocity.js Grunt CSS3 Sass Game Design
